name: Citus Logistics Token
description:
Citus is a comprehensive, AI-enhanced logistics management platform.

Core Features:
- Dashboard with real-time shipment tracking and metrics
- AR Warehouse Visualizer for 3D logistics optimization
- Image Recognition for automated package/inventory processing
- Multi-tenant architecture supporting different organizations
- Integration hub for ERP, CRM, and API management systems

Advanced Capabilities:
- Mobile-first design with offline data sync
- Real-time tracking of vehicles, shipments, and employees
- Route optimization and location management
- Billing/subscription system with token-based usage
- Secure authentication with profile management
- Cross-platform support (web, iOS, Android via Capacitor)

Tech Stack: React + TypeScript, Supabase backend, AR/3D visualization, AI image processing, and comprehensive mobile capabilities.

CLT powers subscriptions, usage metering, rewards, and ecosystem access on Solana (Devnet).
